ygData.subject: Re: Another Lament question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, that s the way it works.  As of last week I seem to be getting more double-resists (mob I tried to lament comes and attacks me) than usual.  I had a
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 21 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
> Another Lament question.
>
> I have noticed that either one of two things will happen when a mob resists
> the Lament song. Sometimes when you get the resist message the mob doesn't
> aggro and remains where he is at. You can then reattempt to Lament them.
> Other times, the mob will aggro as soon as you get the resist message. It
> appears that a second resist check is made if the mobs resists the initial
> Lament attempt. If the mob fails the second resist check, he doesn't aggro.
> If he makes the second resist check, he aggros on you.
>
> Has anyone else noticed this as well?

Yes, that's the way it works. As of last week I seem to be
getting more double-resists (mob I tried to lament comes and
attacks me) than usual. I had a total of 3 double-resists in
the 2 months or so since I started using this song again.
Then a couple nights in Mistmoore, it failed me 3 times.

Anyone remember back when the song was way overpowered and
couldn't be resisted? Ah those were the days... :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
